title: Prince of Wales shows his support ahead of South Africa clash as 'Sheriff of Carmarthen' rallies the troops
text:
It was not the sort of scorching insight for which you would need to position someone in a tall building with a long lens. But as an appraisal of South Africa’s rugby team, it was difficult to find fault with Prince Charles’s pithy description.

“He just said, 'They’re bloody big buggers, aren’t they?'” revealed Ken Owens when asked what words of wisdom HRH The Prince of Wales had imparted to the Welsh squad ahead of their World Cup semi-final clash with South Africa on Sunday. “He left it at that. He just wished us all the best really.”
